alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns, north central Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bostwick, or 9 miles south of Green Cove Springs, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Picolata and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
